Resist-in: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, resist[bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
conditionImmune-in: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages-in: the languages it knew in life
T1D-in: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
T2D-in: The allip doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
A1D-in: {@atk ms + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.
A2D-in: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.
A3D-in: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.
